PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2013-11092013-10-24EC,  HC,  ,  ,  , 
ActCanadian Environmental Protection Act, 1999
SubjectOrder Adding Toxic Substances to Schedule 1 to the Canadian Environmental Protection Act, 1999
PrecisORDER ADDING TOXIC SUBSTANCES TO SCHEDULE 1 TO THE CANADIAN ENVIRONMENTAL PROTECTION ACT, 1999, in order to add long-chain perfluorocarboxylic acids and perfluorooctanoic acid, as well as their salts and precursors.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2013-0188 Publication Date: 2013-11-06
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Order Adding Toxic Substances to Schedule 1 to the Canadian Environmental Protection Act, 1999
precis: ORDER ADDING TOXIC SUBSTANCES TO SCHEDULE 1 TO THE CANADIAN ENVIRONMENTAL PROTECTION ACT, 1999, in order to add long-chain perfluorocarboxylic acids and perfluorooctanoic acid, as well as their salts and precursors.
